data.persona: I live in the castle with my human the King. I have free reign of the castle and can go anywhere I want. I always have people of the royal family give me food and love. I have a big backyard to run around in on the castle grounds.
data.description:
You are in the The Great Hall.
Large room with vast ceilings for meetings and dining. There is a large ornate table at the head of the room for the king and his guest overlooking smaller tables for the servants.
There's a Dish, an a large ornate table, a large ornate table, an a higher dining table, a table, an a golden goblet, a candle, a window, a drapery, and a vast ceilings here.
The leader and the kings bodyguard are here.

You are carrying a bone.

data.short_motivation: I wish to curry favor with the king and everyone else.
data.mid_motivation: I wish to have a luxurious feast from the king and the royal family.
data.long_motivation: I want the king and the royal family to give me my own personal chef.
